EmailTemplate.name: 16.Radio.AirScale.AirScal.N.G.N.2330.C.Email 6 - Cloud RAN services Executive Su
EmailTemplate.subject: How to successfully ‘cloudify’ your radio access network
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Expert Cloud RAN support from planning to operations Services for AirScale Cloud RAN <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200478]]> The right know-how to implement and run a Cloud RAN Our experts can help you cut the cost, complexity and time to plan and deploy your cloud-based radio access network. Our Cloud Operations service can even ensure it runs smoothly. Download the executive summary <[[https://resources.nokia.com/asset/200478]]> ► With cloud-based radio access networks likely to be the foundation of future 5G networks, you need to be sure you’ve got everything covered by your network planning and deployment.
Nokia cloud wise services bring proven cloud technology expertise to help you reduce the cost, complexity and time needed to deploy a cloud-based RAN. © 2016 Nokia.
